text: (Napiye! Kurum;)"allah allatavanaiya (tirppalikkum) nitipatiyaka nan tetuven? Avantan unkalukku (virivana) vilakkamana vetattai irakkiyullan; evarkalukku nam vetattaik kotuttirukkinromo avarkal niccayamaka itu (kur'an) um'mutaiya iraivanitamiruntu unmaiyaka irakkappattullatu enpatai nanku arivarkal. Enave nir cantekam kolpavarkalil oruvaraki vitatir
